content: As an AI language model, I do not possess the ability to know why the differences exist, but I can tell you that these differences have arisen due to various cultural, historical and religious practices. Sephardi Jews originate from the Iberian Peninsula and surrounding regions in the Middle East and North Africa, while Ashkenazi Jews originate from Central and Eastern Europe. The different regions and historical contexts in which these groups lived have likely contributed to the differences in their burial practices. Additionally, there may be differences in specific religious and cultural beliefs and traditions within each group that have influenced their burial practices.
